name: Dungeon Of Despair (SandwichBlamwich_)
description:
Dungeon Of Despair is a short Interactive Fiction game coded in playfic, and runs on any Z-CODE interpreter!

In The Mountain-Filled land of Gyracx, under the mountain Ypouski, there lies the DUNGEON OF DESPAIR...

>start game

(there is a playthrough here for anyone who needs it)
